price: Wontumi nso nkyerε anifirafoͻ kwan mfri wͻn yeraa mu. Nea wobetumi ama no ate ne obi a ͻgye Yεn Nsεm no die, na wͻyε Muslimifoͻ, (brε wͻn ho ase de ma Nyame).
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā anta bihādī al-ʿum'yi ʿan ḍalālatihim in tus'miʿu illā man yu'minu biāyātinā fahum mus'limūna
